titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an assured adequate level of funding for veterans health care.
Mandatory Funding for Veterans Act of 2007
Mandatory Funding for Veterans Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Mandatory Funding for Veterans Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to make available to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for each fiscal year the amount determined under a specified formula for veterans health care programs, functions, and activities of the Veterans Health Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA).
